product_name: Light My Fire Grandpa's Fire Fork
long_description: Put away your pocket knife and roast all your favorite foods with the simple yet smart Grandpa's FireFork(TM). No more hassling with flimsy sticks and hand-carved points, the FireFork attaches firmly to just about any branch. Works great with dead branches, so no need to cut living trees. Made from a single piece of stainless-steel wire, the fork is strong enough to support heavier food items without bending or collapsing. Compact and lightweight so you can bring it along on every trip. Also makes a great fire poker. Includes a storage safety cap, available in assorted colors only.
short_description: Put away your pocket knife and roast all your favorite foods with the simple yet smart Grandpa's FireFork(TM).
